levels.description: Attack Interval <@ba.vdown>increases</>, ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, splash area <@ba.vup>expands</>, and each attack causes <@ba.vup>2</> additional shockwaves; Enemies hit by this unit's attacks and shockwaves have a <@ba.vup>{attack@prob:0%}</> chance to be <$ba.stun>Stunned</> for <@ba.vup>{attack@stun}</> seconds
